metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6512 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Inappropriate implementation in Web Browser UI in Google Chrome prior to120.0.6099.62 allowed a remote attacker to potentially spoof the contentsof an iframe dialog context menu via a crafted HTML page. (Chromiumsecurity severity: Low)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
